items.question: What is Mediscan AI?
items.answer: Mediscan AI is an advanced web-based health integration platform that uses artificial intelligence to analyze medical and genomic data. It supports clinicians with fast, accurate, and personalized insights for better patient care.

items.question: How does Mediscan AI ensure data security?
items.answer: We prioritize data privacy and security. Mediscan AI is built with enterprise-level encryption and complies with HIPAA, GDPR, and other global standards, ensuring all health data is fully protected.

items.question: Who can use Mediscan AI?
items.answer: Mediscan AI is designed for healthcare professionals, researchers, and institutions. Its user-friendly interface allows clinicians of all levels to easily access, interpret, and apply AI-driven insights in their workflow.

items.question: How accurate are the AI diagnostics?
items.answer: Our AI models are trained on vast, high-quality datasets and continuously updated to ensure clinical accuracy. Mediscan AI provides detailed, clinician-ready reports backed by real-world medical intelligence.

items.question: What makes Mediscan AI different?
items.answer: Mediscan AI stands out with its seamless integration, fast turnaround times, intuitive design, and trusted clinical accuracy. We bring advanced diagnostics within reach — no specialized training required.

0.name: Astghik Medical Center
0.description: Astghik Medical Center is a modern, multidisciplinary hospital offering advanced medical services with international standards and cutting-edge technologies.

1.name: Izmirlyan Medical Center
1.description: Izmirlyan Medical Center is a multifunctional hospital known for specialties like urology, cardiology, and surgery, affiliated with the Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin.

2.name: Erebuni Medical Center
2.description: Erebuni Medical Center is Armenia's largest hospital, providing full-spectrum care including emergency services, diagnostics, and surgery since 1991.

3.name: Davidyants Laboratory
3.description: Davidyants Laboratory specializes in clinical diagnostics, offering services like histology, immunohistochemistry, and infectious disease testing.

4.name: Slawmed Medical Center
4.description: Slawmed is a multidisciplinary medical center offering treatments in gynecology, urology, ENT, ophthalmology, and other fields with modern equipment.

5.name: Wigmore Medical Center
5.description: Wigmore Medical Center provides top-quality care in orthopedics, spine surgery, vascular surgery, cardiology, and more, with a patient-focused approach.

6.name: Nairi Medical Center
6.description: Nairi Medical Center is a leading Armenian hospital offering high-standard medical care across multiple specialties and promoting medical research and education.

7.name: Hematological Center
7.description: The Armenian Hematological Center specializes in diagnosing and treating blood disorders, providing advanced care for both children and adults.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We are a pioneering healthcare technology company leveraging artificial intelligence to revolutionize medical diagnostics and patient care.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower healthcare professionals with AI-driven tools that enhance diagnostic accuracy and improve patient outcomes through data-driven insights.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the global leader in AI-powered medical diagnostics, making advanced healthcare analytics accessible and actionable for medical professionals worldwide.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Innovation, accuracy, and trust are at our core. We are committed to developing cutting-edge solutions while maintaining the highest standards of data security and clinical precision.
